definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly

sentences.english: A sports organizer lets you see what’s where while keeping equipment in its place.
sentences.chinese: 运动器材存放处让你对它们的位置一目了然。

sentences.english: As far as I can see the whole matter is open-and-shut.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来，整件事情是一目了然的。

sentences.english: It should be clear where this path leads.
sentences.chinese: 这条道路通向何方应该是一目了然的。

sentences.english: Running state Gao Qingzhi show all the way, be clear at a glance.
sentences.chinese: 运行状态全程高清直显，一目了然。

sentences.english: Large clear glass display surface, cabinet items at a glance.
sentences.chinese: 大面积清晰玻璃展示面，柜内物品一目了然。

sentences.english: In this period right now, I don't like open-and-shut stuff.
sentences.chinese: 这个阶段，我不喜欢一目了然的东西。

sentences.english: Historical transition is not an abstract concept but clear to see.
sentences.chinese: 历史的过渡并非抽象的概念，在此一目了然。

sentences.english: Handset with a simple menu, easy to operate, at a glance.
sentences.chinese: 手持机具有简洁菜单，操作方便，一目了然。

sentences.english: "It's very rare to have a human study where you can see that this caused that, " Wattenberg said.
sentences.chinese: 让公众能一目了然理解的研究是很少有的。

sentences.english: "This is no clear-cut case, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “这并非是个一目了然的案子，”他这样说。

sentences.english: One glance at the fantastical Steel House, and you'll never forget it.
sentences.chinese: 钢之家在梦幻般一目了然钢之家，你将永远不会忘记。

sentences.english: And it might be that these things can actually come apart.
sentences.chinese: 也许这样事情就一目了然了。

sentences.english: Completely transparent glass structure, spacious and bright, admire the view, be clear at a glance.
sentences.chinese: 全透明玻璃构造，宽敞明亮，观赏风景，一目了然。

sentences.english: Hollow glass door, showing good results, cabinet items at a glance.
sentences.chinese: 中空玻璃门，展示效果佳，柜内物品一目了然。

sentences.english: Cheap shoes, much like icky fabric, look obvious.
sentences.chinese: 便宜的鞋子，像讨厌的布料一样，让人一目了然。

sentences.english: He would have an idea of what was happening to Hearn.
sentences.chinese: 他对候恩的情况可以一目了然。

definition: to understand clearly/to be clear about/plain/clear/also written 明瞭|明了[ming2 liao3]
to understand clearly/to be clear about/plain/clear
direct observation/directly perceived through the senses/intuitive/audiovisual
clear/distinct/to understand thoroughly/to be clear about
as for/as to/to go so far as to
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to contrast/to compare/to place side by side for comparison (as parallel texts)/to check
the top/above/overhead/upwards/the top margin/above-mentioned/those higher up
